mapper.select: select a.company_id, company_logo, company_name, company_industry, company_type, count(review_seq) as reviewcount, ifnull(TRUNCATE((avg(welfare)+avg(inner_culture)+avg(work_life_balance)+avg(p_opportunity)+avg(management))/5,1),0) as totalstar, ifnull(truncate(avg(my_salary),0),0) as avgsalary from company_detail a left join reviews b on a.company_id = b.company_id group by a.company_id, company_name, company_industry, company_type, company_logo order by totalstar desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select a.company_id, company_logo, company_name, company_industry, company_type, count(review_seq) as reviewcount, ifnull(TRUNCATE((avg(welfare)+avg(inner_culture)+avg(work_life_balance)+avg(p_opportunity)+avg(management))/5,1),0) as totalstar, ifnull(truncate(avg(my_salary),0),0) as avgsalary from company_detail a left join reviews b on a.company_id = b.company_id where company_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') group by a.company_id, company_name, company_industry, company_type, company_logo order by totalstar desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from company_detail where company_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select count(industry_class) as counting from company_detail where industry_class = #{indus_class}

select a.review_seq,company_id,review_content,reg_date,a.mem_id,welfare,work_life_balance, inner_culture,p_opportunity,management,pros,cons,my_salary,current_yn, count(like_seq) as countlike, (select count(*) from review_like where review_seq=a.review_seq and mem_id=#{mem_id}) as like_check from reviews a left join review_like b on a.review_seq = b.review_seq where company_id=#{company_id} group by a.review_seq,company_id,review_content,review_likes,reg_date,a.mem_id,pros;
select count(*) as countreview from reviews where company_id=#{company_id}

select ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(welfare),1),0) AS welfare, ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(work_life_balance),1),0) as work_life_balance, ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(inner_culture),1),0) as inner_culture,ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(p_opportunity),1),0) as p_opportunity, ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(management),1),0) as management, ifnull(TRUNCATE((avg(welfare)+avg(inner_culture)+avg(work_life_balance)+avg(p_opportunity)+avg(management))/5,2),0) as totalstar, ifnull(TRUNCATE(avg(my_salary),0),0) as avgsalary from reviews where company_id = #{company_id}
mapper.insert: insert into reviews (company_id, review_content, review_likes, reg_date, mem_id, welfare, work_life_balance, inner_culture, p_opportunity, management, pros, cons, my_salary, current_yn) values (#{company_id}, #{review_content}, 0, NOW(), #{mem_id}, #{welfare}, #{work_life_balance}, #{inner_culture}, #{p_opportunity}, #{management}, #{pros}, #{cons}, #{my_salary}, #{current_yn})
mapper.select: select count(*) as countgongo from recruit where company_id = #{company_id}
select count(*) as like_check from review_like where mem_id = #{mem_id} and review_seq = #{review_seq}
mapper.delete: delete from review_like where mem_id = #{mem_id} and review_seq = #{review_seq}
